name: AXChartDescriptorRepresentable
desc: A type to generate an AXChartDescriptor object that you use to provide information about a chart and its data for an accessible experience in VoiceOver or other assistive technologies.

items.name: func makeChartDescriptor() -> AXChartDescriptor
items.desc: Create the AXChartDescriptor for this view, and return it.

items.name: func updateChartDescriptor(AXChartDescriptor)
items.desc: Update the existing AXChartDescriptor for your view, based on changes in your view or in the Environment.
